subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: At a meeting in Milwaukee on Tuesday, Bud Selig, the M.L.B. commissioner, told his Japanese counterpart, Ryozo Kato, he was open to the idea of teams from both countries playing before he retires in 2012.
snippet: At a meeting in Milwaukee on Tuesday, Bud Selig, the M.L.B. commissioner, told his Japanese counterpart, Ryozo Kato, he was open to the idea of teams from both countries playing before he retires in 2012.
